refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts AC-like LDAP schemas to OpenLDAP compatible schema files

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ad2oLschema is a simple tool that converts AD-like LDIF schema files into OpenLDAP schema files.

listitem.para: URL to an LDB or LDAP server with an AD schema to read.
AD schema to read. If neither this nor -H is specified, the schema file will be read from standard input.
File to write OpenLDAP version of schema to.

refsect1.title: VERSION
refsect1.para: This man page is correct for version 4.0 of the Samba suite.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: ldb was written by Andrew Tridgell. ad2oLschema was written by Andrew Bartlett.
